description: This file defines a React functional component named ConfirmDialog, which renders a modal dialog for confirmation prompts such as delete actions. It manages focus and accessibility attributes and provides customizable labels and tones.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog({ open, title = 'Are you sure?', description, confirmLabel = 'Confirm', tone = 'primary', onCancel, onConfirm })
methods.description: React component that renders a confirmation modal dialog with customizable title, description, labels, and tone. It manages focus on open and handles cancel/confirm actions.
